source:
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, max, coalesce, trunc, lit, add_months
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql.functions import to_date

# Tworzenie sesji Spark
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("Load Planning Book").getOrCreate()

# Parametry dla warstwy Silver (ADLS Gen2)
bucket_name = "abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/"
bucket_name_gold = "abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/"

# Ścieżki do plików Parquet w ADLS Gen2
f_sales_path = f"{bucket_name}/f_sales"
f_forecast_path = f"{bucket_name}/f_forecast"
f_pos_data_path = f"{bucket_name}/f_pos_data"
f_wh_data_path = f"{bucket_name}/f_wh_data"

# Ścieżka do warstwy Gold (f_planning_book)
f_sales_path_gold = f"{bucket_name_gold}/f_planning_book"

# Załaduj dane z ADLS (tabele f_sales, f_forecast, f_pos_data, f_wh_data)
f_sales = spark.read.parquet(f_sales_path)
f_forecast = spark.read.parquet(f_forecast_path)
f_pos_data = spark.read.parquet(f_pos_data_path)
f_wh_data = spark.read.parquet(f_wh_data_path)



# Pobranie maksymalnej wartości forecast_snapshot z f_forecast
current_month_snapshot = f_forecast.agg(F.max("forecast_snapshot")).collect()[0][0]
current_month_snapshot = to_date(lit(current_month_snapshot), "yyyy-MM-dd")
last_month_snapshot = F.add_months(F.lit(current_month_snapshot), -1)

f_forecast_filtered = f_forecast.filter(F.col("forecast_snapshot").isin(current_month_snapshot, last_month_snapshot))

# Filtrowanie dla obecnego i poprzedniego miesiąca
f_forecast_current = f_forecast_filtered.filter((F.col("forecast_date") >= current_month_snapshot) &(F.col("forecast_snapshot") == current_month_snapshot))
f_forecast_last = f_forecast_filtered.filter((F.col("forecast_date") >= last_month_snapshot) &  (F.col("forecast_snapshot") == last_month_snapshot))

# Filtrowanie f_sales

f_sales_current = f_sales.filter(F.col("shipped_date") < current_month_snapshot)
f_sales_last = f_sales.filter(F.col("shipped_date") < last_month_snapshot)

f_pos_data_current = f_pos_data.filter(F.col("transaction_date") < current_month_snapshot)
f_pos_data_last = f_pos_data.filter(F.col("transaction_date") < last_month_snapshot)

f_wh_data_current = f_wh_data.filter(F.col("transaction_date") < current_month_snapshot)
f_wh_data_last = f_wh_data.filter(F.col("transaction_date") < last_month_snapshot)


# Ujednolicona lista kolumn
common_columns = [
    "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
    "quantity", "amount", "unit_price",
    "whrs_sell_in_quantity", "whrs_open_quantity", "whrs_end_quantity",
    "whrs_sell_in_amount", "whrs_open_amount", "whrs_end_amount",
    "pos_sell_out_quantity", "pos_open_quantity", "pos_end_quantity",
    "pos_sell_out_amount", "pos_open_amount", "pos_end_amount",
    "discount"
]

# Normalizacja f_forecast (zachowuje oryginalny forecast_snapshot)
f_forecast_current_norm = f_forecast_current \
    .withColumnRenamed("forecast_date", "financial_date") \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "quantity", "amount", "unit_price",
        "whrs_sell_in_quantity", "whrs_open_quantity", "whrs_end_quantity",
        "whrs_sell_in_amount", "whrs_open_amount", "whrs_end_amount",
        "pos_sell_out_quantity", "pos_open_quantity", "pos_end_quantity",
        "pos_sell_out_amount", "pos_open_amount", "pos_end_amount",
        "0.0 as discount"  # Jeżeli discount jest typu double
    )

f_forecast_last_norm = f_forecast_last \
    .withColumnRenamed("forecast_date", "financial_date") \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "quantity", "amount", "unit_price",
        "whrs_sell_in_quantity", "whrs_open_quantity", "whrs_end_quantity",
        "whrs_sell_in_amount", "whrs_open_amount", "whrs_end_amount",
        "pos_sell_out_quantity", "pos_open_quantity", "pos_end_quantity",
        "pos_sell_out_amount", "pos_open_amount", "pos_end_amount",
        "0.0 as discount"  # Jeżeli discount jest typu double
    )



# Normalizacja f_sales
f_sales_current_norm = f_sales_current \
    .withColumnRenamed("shipped_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot",  current_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "quantity", "amount", "unit_price",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_quantity", "0 as whrs_open_quantity", "0 as whrs_end_quantity",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_amount", "0 as whrs_open_amount", "0 as whrs_end_amount",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_quantity", "0 as pos_open_quantity", "0 as pos_end_quantity",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_amount", "0 as pos_open_amount", "0 as pos_end_amount",
        "discount"
    )

f_sales_last_norm = f_sales_last \
    .withColumnRenamed("shipped_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot", last_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "quantity", "amount", "unit_price",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_quantity", "0 as whrs_open_quantity", "0 as whrs_end_quantity",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_amount", "0 as whrs_open_amount", "0 as whrs_end_amount",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_quantity", "0 as pos_open_quantity", "0 as pos_end_quantity",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_amount", "0 as pos_open_amount", "0 as pos_end_amount",
        "discount"
    )

# Normalizacja f_pos_data_path
f_pos_data_current_norm = f_pos_data_current \
    .withColumnRenamed("transaction_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot", current_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "0 as quantity", "0 as amount", "unit_price",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_quantity", "0 as whrs_open_quantity", "0 as whrs_end_quantity",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_amount", "0 as whrs_open_amount", "0 as whrs_end_amount",
        "pos_sell_out_quantity", "pos_open_quantity", "pos_end_quantity",
        "pos_sell_out_amount", "pos_open_amount", "pos_end_amount",
        "0 as discount"
    )

f_pos_data_last_norm = f_pos_data_last \
    .withColumnRenamed("transaction_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot", last_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "0 as quantity", "0 as amount", "unit_price",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_quantity", "0 as whrs_open_quantity", "0 as whrs_end_quantity",
        "0 as whrs_sell_in_amount", "0 as whrs_open_amount", "0 as whrs_end_amount",
        "pos_sell_out_quantity", "pos_open_quantity", "pos_end_quantity",
        "pos_sell_out_amount", "pos_open_amount", "pos_end_amount",
        "0 as discount"
    )

# Normalizacja f_wh_data_path
f_wh_data_current_norm = f_wh_data_current \
    .withColumnRenamed("transaction_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot",  current_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "0 as quantity", "0 as amount", "unit_price",
        "whrs_sell_in_quantity", "whrs_open_quantity", "whrs_end_quantity",
        "whrs_sell_in_amount", "whrs_open_amount", "whrs_end_amount",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_quantity", "0 as pos_open_quantity", "0 as pos_end_quantity",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_amount", "0 as pos_open_amount", "0 as pos_end_amount",
        "0 as discount"
    )

f_wh_data_last_norm = f_wh_data_last \
    .withColumnRenamed("transaction_date", "financial_date") \
    .withColumn("forecast_snapshot", last_month_snapshot) \
    .selectExpr(
        "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot",
        "0 as quantity", "0 as amount", "unit_price",
        "whrs_sell_in_quantity", "whrs_open_quantity", "whrs_end_quantity",
        "whrs_sell_in_amount", "whrs_open_amount", "whrs_end_amount",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_quantity", "0 as pos_open_quantity", "0 as pos_end_quantity",
        "0 as pos_sell_out_amount", "0 as pos_open_amount", "0 as pos_end_amount",
        "0 as discount"
    )


# UNION wszystkich DataFrame'ów

f_forecast_current_norm
f_forecast_last_norm
f_sales_current_norm 
f_sales_last_norm
f_pos_data_current_norm
f_pos_data_last_norm
f_wh_data_current_norm
f_wh_data_last_norm

final_df = f_forecast_current_norm.unionByName(f_forecast_last_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_sales_current_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_sales_last_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_pos_data_current_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_pos_data_last_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_wh_data_current_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) \
    .unionByName(f_wh_data_last_norm, allowMissingColumns=True) 


bucket_name_gold = "gold"

# Load Data
f_sales_path = f"s3a://{bucket_name}/f_planning_book"

aggregated_df = final_df.groupBy(
    "product_id", "country_id", "financial_date", "forecast_snapshot"
).agg(
    # Suma dla kolumn liczbowych
    F.sum("quantity").alias("quantity"),
    F.sum("amount").alias("amount"),
    F.avg("unit_price").alias("unit_price"),
    
    # Suma dla innych kolumn
    F.sum("whrs_sell_in_quantity").alias("whrs_sell_in_quantity"),
    F.sum("whrs_open_quantity").alias("whrs_open_quantity"),
    F.sum("whrs_end_quantity").alias("whrs_end_quantity"),
    F.sum("whrs_sell_in_amount").alias("whrs_sell_in_amount"),
    F.sum("whrs_open_amount").alias("whrs_open_amount"),
    F.sum("whrs_end_amount").alias("whrs_end_amount"),
    
    F.sum("pos_sell_out_quantity").alias("pos_sell_out_quantity"),
    F.sum("pos_open_quantity").alias("pos_open_quantity"),
    F.sum("pos_end_quantity").alias("pos_end_quantity"),
    F.sum("pos_sell_out_amount").alias("pos_sell_out_amount"),
    F.sum("pos_open_amount").alias("pos_open_amount"),
    F.sum("pos_end_amount").alias("pos_end_amount"),
    
    # Agregacja dla discount (średnia)
    F.sum("discount").alias("discount")
)


aggregated_df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(f_sales_path_gold)





import pandas as pd

# Załaduj dane
df_pandas = aggregated_df.toPandas()

df_pandas = df_pandas.drop(columns=['discount', 'unit_price'])

# Unpivotowanie (melt)
df_melted = df_pandas.melt(
   id_vars=['product_id', 'country_id', 'financial_date', 'forecast_snapshot'],
    var_name="original_column",
    value_name="value"
)


# Tworzenie nowej kolumny 'measure' na podstawie obecności 'quantity' lub 'amount' w nazwie kolumny
df_melted["Measure"] = df_melted["original_column"].apply(lambda x: "EA" if "quantity" in x.lower() else "GTS" if "amount" in x.lower() else "unknown")

# Mapowanie nazw kolumn na nowe formaty
measure_mapping = {
    'quantity': 'Ex-Factory',
    'amount': 'Ex-Factory',
    'whrs_sell_in_quantity': 'Sales to pharmacies',
    'whrs_open_quantity': 'Open Stock',
    'whrs_end_quantity': 'Close Stock',
    'whrs_sell_in_amount': 'Sales to pharmacies',
    'whrs_open_amount': 'Open Stock',
    'whrs_end_amount': 'Close Stock',
    'pos_sell_out_quantity': 'Sales to pharmacies',
    'pos_open_quantity': 'Open Stock Pharmacies',
    'pos_end_quantity': 'Close Stock Pharmacies',
    'pos_sell_out_amount': 'Sales to pharmacies',
    'pos_open_amount': 'Open Stock Pharmacies',
    'pos_end_amount': 'Close Stock Pharmacies'
}

# Zastosowanie mapowania
df_melted["original_column"] = df_melted["original_column"].replace(measure_mapping)

# Usuwamy wiersze z brakującymi wartościami
df_melted = df_melted.dropna(subset=["original_column", "value"])

# Pivotowanie danych
df_pivoted = df_melted.pivot_table(
    index=['product_id', 'country_id', 'financial_date', 'forecast_snapshot', 'Measure'],  
    columns='original_column',
    values='value',
    aggfunc='first'  # lub 'sum', jeśli chcesz sumować wartości
).reset_index()

# Usunięcie nazwy kolumny po pivotowaniu
df_pivoted.columns.name = None


# Znalezienie maksymalnej daty
max_forecast_snapshot = df_pivoted["forecast_snapshot"].max()

# Dodanie kolumny status
df_pivoted["Version"] =  df_pivoted["forecast_snapshot"].apply(lambda x: "Current" if x == max_forecast_snapshot  else "Last")

bucket_name_gold = "abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_planning_book_unpivot"

# Ścieżka do warstwy Gold (f_planning_book)
f_sales_path_gold = f"{bucket_name_gold}/f_planning_book_unpivot"

df_spark = spark.createDataFrame(df_pivoted)

df_spark=df_spark.withColumnRenamed('product_id', 'IdProduct').withColumnRenamed('country_id', 'IDCountry').withColumnRenamed('financial_date', 'Date').withColumnRenamed('Close Stock', 'Close_Stock').withColumnRenamed('Ex-Factory', 'Ex_Factory').withColumnRenamed('Open Stock', 'Open_Stock').withColumnRenamed('Open Stock Pharmacies', 'Open_Stock_Pharmacies').withColumnRenamed('Sales to pharmacies', 'Sales_to_pharmacies').withColumnRenamed('Close Stock Pharmacies', 'Close_Stock_Pharmacies')


df_spark.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_planning_book_unpivot")

spark.sql("""
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gold.f_planning_book_unpivot
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_planning_book_unpivot'
""")
